Game Rules

  1. Game Start
    • Each player receives 100 coins upon registration.
    • The bet for each round is fixed at 10 coins.
  2. Gameplay
    • The player controls a Leprechaun who jumps across the level (stumps, stones, platforms, etc.).
    • With each successful jump, the bet multiplier increases.
    • The goal is to make as many jumps as possible and earn more coins.
  3. Risks
    • Each round has a hidden CRASH — a random losing step.
    • The probability of losing increases with each step.
  4. Winning
    • Winnings = bet × step multiplier.
    • The player can collect their winnings at any time by pressing Cash Out.
  5. Luck (Clover)
    • Each successful jump adds 1 Luck point to the round balance.
  6. Bonuses
    • A bonus element (a pot of Luck) may appear on the path.
  7. Math
    • The game consists of 24 steps per round.
    • A CRASH occurs randomly with a probability of 1 in 25 per step.
  8. Additional Tasks and Balance Refill
    • Players can earn more gold by completing social tasks, in-game quests, and inviting friends.

FAQ: Leprechaun Jump Game

  1. How do I start the game?
    • Press START button to make a bet. It is fixed - 10 coins for each round.
  2. What is the goal of the game?
    • Guide the Leprechaun through a series of jumps, increase your winnings with each step, and cash out before hitting a hidden CRASH. Improve your level to become the top player!
  3. How does the betting and winning system work?
    • Winnings are calculated as bet × step multiplier. You can cash out anytime before CRASH to add your round balance to your main balance.
  4. What is CRASH, and how does it work?
    • CRASH is a hidden losing step randomly placed on the 24-step path. The chance of reaching the final step with a maximum multiplier of x20 is 4%.
  5. What is Luck, and how do I earn it?
    • Luck (Clover) is a secondary resource earned with each successful jump (+1 per step). Luck contributes to rankings, levels, and bonuses, but is lost if you hit a CRASH.
  6. Are there any bonuses?
    • Bonus elements like the Pot of Luck appear randomly on the path. The further the pot, the more Luck it provides, but it’s also lost if CRASH occurs before cashing out.
  7. What happens if I hit a CRASH?
    • You lose your bet and all progress from the current round, including collected gold and Luck.
  8. How can I earn more gold?
    • Complete social tasks, participate in in-game quests, invite friends, or purchase gold using Telegram stars.
  9. How is the leaderboard calculated?
    • The leaderboard ranks players based on their accumulated Luck. The more you play and win, the higher your position.
  10. Will you have a token?
    • NO
